c85636efcc3e0978b4937ec42059590e.return:
("entity"<|>"SMIG"<|>"Proposition"<|>"SMIG refers to the Salaire Minimum Interprofessionnel de Croissance, with a proposed increase of 15% by citizens expressing the need for higher minimum wage.")##
("entity"<|>"Salaires"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Salaires refers to wages that are proposed to increase by 10% for those under 2000 €, highlighting the citizens' concerns for low-income earners.")##
("entity"<|>"Retraites"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Retraites denotes pensions, which are proposed to be indexed to inflation, ensuring financial stability for retirees.")##
("entity"<|>"RIP"<|>"Proposition"<|>"RIP refers to the Rappel d'Initiative Populaire, a proposal concerning citizen-initiated legislation.")##
("entity"<|>"Commissions Théodule"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Commissions Théodule represents various governmental commissions, proposed for dissolution by citizens who seek reduction in bureaucracy.")##
("entity"<|>"Sénat"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Sénat refers to the French Senate, with a proposal for its complete abolition, reflecting citizens’ demand for reform in governance.")##
("entity"<|>"Hauts Fonctionnaires"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Hauts Fonctionnaires pertains to high-ranking officials, proposed to have their income limited as part of financial reforms.")##
("entity"<|>"Ministres"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Ministres refers to members of the government, proposed to have their incomes reduced, excluding mayors, in response to calls for governmental accountability.")##
("entity"<|>"Vote Blanc"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Vote Blanc advocates for the recognition of blank votes, emphasizing the importance of voter expression and reform in voting rights.")##
("entity"<|>"Proportionnelle"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Proportionnelle supports the implementation of proportional representation in elections, reflecting a demand for fairer electoral processes.")##
("entity"<|>"Justice Équitable"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Justice Équitable emphasizes the need for justice that is fair between the wealthy and the rest of the population, highlighting social equity concerns.")##
("relationship"<|>"SMIG"<|>"Salaires"<|>"Citizens propose a direct correlation where a rise in SMIG's minimum wage is linked to the increase of salaries for low-wage earners."<|>8)##
("relationship"<|>"Retraites"<|>"SMIG"<|>"The proposed indexing of pensions to inflation highlights the link between living wages and maintaining the purchasing power of retirees."<|>7)##
("relationship"<|>"RIP"<|>"Commissions Théodule"<|>"The proposal for RIP appeals to citizen engagement and directly addresses the need for reducing bureaucratic structures like commissions."<|>6)##
("relationship"<|>"Sénat"<|>"Commissions Théodule"<|>"The proposed dissolution of the Sénat aligns with the request to eliminate various commissions, indicating a push for streamlined governance."<|>7)##
("relationship"<|>"Hauts Fonctionnaires"<|>"Ministres"<|>"The proposals for limiting income of hauts fonctionnaires and reducing ministers’ salaries denote a broader call for government accountability and reform."<|>9)##
("relationship"<|>"Vote Blanc"<|>"Proportionnelle"<|>"Proposing both recognition of blank votes and proportional representation signifies citizens’ call for reforms that enhance voter inclusivity and fairness."<|>8)##
("relationship"<|>"Justice Équitable"<|>"Salaires"<|>"The focus on equitable justice reveals a desire for fair treatment and wage adjustments, thereby connecting social justice with economic reform."<|>8)<|COMPLETE|>

a941327a30d70e0468d9bf327d2d4525.return:
("entity"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Contribution"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe is a citizen contribution document expressing the opinions and proposals of residents from the commune regarding public policies and services.")##
("entity"<|>"Pouvoir d’achat"<|>"Thematique"<|>"Pouvoir d’achat refers to the purchasing power of citizens and addresses concerns and proposals related to it in the contribution.")##
("entity"<|>"Hausse des salaires"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Hausse des salaires is a proposal advocating for an increase in salaries to improve citizens' purchasing power.")##
("entity"<|>"Suppression de la CSG pour les retraités"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Suppression de la CSG pour les retraités is a proposal suggesting the removal of the General Social Contribution for retirees to enhance their financial situation.")##
("entity"<|>"Baisse de la TVA sur produits de 1ère nécessité"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Baisse de la TVA sur produits de 1ère nécessité is a proposal for reducing the VAT on essential goods to alleviate financial burdens on citizens.")##
("entity"<|>"AAH"<|>"ServicePublic"<|>"AAH (Allocation aux Adultes Handicapés) refers to the financial assistance provided to disabled adults, implying a concern to review its amount and related aids.")##
("entity"<|>"Charges pour les petits entrepreneurs"<|>"Doleance"<|>"Charges pour les petits entrepreneurs addresses the grievances regarding the financial burdens faced by small business owners, calling for a reduction of these charges.")##
("entity"<|>"RIC"<|>"Proposition"<|>"RIC (Référendum d'Initiative Citoyenne) is proposed as a mechanism for citizens to have a voice in the legislative process through citizen debates.")##
("entity"<|>"ISF"<|>"ReformeFiscale"<|>"ISF (Impôt de Solidarité sur la Fortune) is a proposed tax reform suggesting a fairer tax system to replace the existing ISF.")##
("entity"<|>"Vote blanc"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Vote blanc is proposed for recognition, allowing votes to express dissent in elections without endorsing any candidate.")##
("entity"<|>"Forces de l’ordre"<|>"ActeurInstitutionnel"<|>"Forces de l'ordre refers to law enforcement agencies, with calls for preventing misconduct and the suggestion to remove the use of flashballs.")##
("entity"<|>"Suppression du flashball"<|>"Proposition"<|>"Suppression du flashball is a proposal advocating for the removal of flashball weapons used by law enforcement to prevent excessive violence.")##

("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Pouvoir d’achat"<|>"The contribution discusses the theme of purchasing power, highlighting related grievances and proposals."<|>8)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Hausse des salaires"<|>"The proposal for an increase in salaries is part of the contributions aimed at improving citizens' purchasing power."<|>9)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Suppression de la CSG pour les retraités"<|>"The proposal to remove the CSG for retirees is associated with the broader theme of improving financial conditions for citizens."<|>8)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Baisse de la TVA sur produits de 1ère nécessité"<|>"The proposal to lower VAT on essential products links directly to the theme of enhancing purchasing power of citizens."<|>9)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"AAH"<|>"The contribution addresses the need to review the AAH as part of the theme of social assistance and financial security for citizens."<|>7)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Charges pour les petits entrepreneurs"<|>"This grievance regarding burdens on small entrepreneurs is related to overall economic concerns raised in the contribution."<|>6)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"RIC"<|>"The proposal for a citizen referendum (RIC) is aimed at enhancing citizen engagement in legislative processes as reflected in the contributions."<|>8)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"ISF"<|>"The proposal for a fair tax system represents a fiscal reform being discussed within the contribution's themes."<|>8)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Vote blanc"<|>"The call for recognition of the blank vote links to themes of democratic representation and accountability discussed in the contribution."<|>7)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Forces de l’ordre"<|>"The discussion about law enforcement is connected to the broader themes of public security and citizen rights in the contribution."<|>6)##
("relationship"<|>"Cahier de Sainte-Colombe"<|>"Suppression du flashball"<|>"The proposal advocates for changes in law enforcement practices, relating to the grievances mentioned in the contribution."<|>7)##

<|COMPLETE|>
